## Objective

The NYY are the favourites to win this season major league beacause of their management and strategic purchases of players. They did a similar thing on 2009. The objective of the study is to compare the performance of that year with the current one, and evaluate the competing teams. 

## Data set

We have a vast number of tables information of all the teams from the MLB and all years
